mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, TO_CHAR(b.BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD"," HH24"시"MI"분') AS BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_OFFENSIVE, b.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM BOARD b JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE b.BOARD_CATEGORY = #{boardCategory} AND b.BOARD_OFFENSIVE = 'F' AND b.BOARD_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7

SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, TO_CHAR(b.BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일" HH24"시"MI"분"SS"초"') AS BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_OFFENSIVE, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM BOARD b JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) VALUES ( #{boardId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardContent, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{memberId})
